= Geo IP Database Configuration

The converter `ConfigConverterGeoIPDb` allow to convert environment variable related to geo ip database configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$geo_ip_db.adoc[]


== geoip_city_db
Absolute path to the geoip city database file.

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 11.0 until 18.0

The environment variable `GEOIP_CITY_DB` is used and expect a `Path`.

Possible cli:

* --geoip-db

== geoip_country_db
Absolute path to the geoip country database file.

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 11.0 until 18.0

The environment variable `GEOIP_COUNTRY_DB` is used and expect a `Path`.

Possible cli:

* --geoip-country-db



== Other keys
